---

Authenticates a user using a passkey.

## Import

```ts
import { AuthClient } from "@alchemy/auth";
```

## Usage

```ts
const authSession = await authClient.loginWithPasskey();
```

## Returns

`Promise<AuthSession>`
Promise that resolves to an auth session instance
